Review Text: This shop is amazing! I could have spent hours browsing. They had exactly what I needed and the staff went out of their way to help me!

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Love the variety in this shop. Besides their own brand, you can find here imported brand products which other places don't have. Plus also wigs and accessories. Recommended 100%

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Skip Sephora and head to Make-Up Studio on Rozengracht! Thank you to the amazing associate, Barbara who spent an hour teaching me about various products and techniques. I came in with all of my current supplies and she was incredibly ‚Ä¶

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Went in to get black face paint, the woman was very friendly, helpful and informative, without being pushy at all. In the Netherlands, it's hard to find good customer service, so I was pleasantly surprised when I came here.

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Very beautiful market if you love colours like me!

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Very friendly and knowledgeable staff. This is perfect shop if you are looking for any kind of a make up sets, face painting, wigs, masks...lots of stuff that can make you happy when you are trying to find the right outfit for your party.

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Very nice shop, helpful and nice staff who helped a lot, good quality products with a big variety and many things to choose from. Affordable price and and a good price range, 10/10 would come again.

Name: BackStage
Review Text: Wonderful store and lovely employees. Answered all my questions and were amazing in helping me choose my products. Will definitely make another purchase here soon üëçüèºüíõ

Name: BackStage
Review Text: This used to be the domain of professional MUA and people looking to amp up their party outfit. Now every make-up lover in Amsterdam knows how to find her or his way to this place. Staff is friendly, knowledgeable and looks smashing.
